titleStmt.title: The principall passages of Germany, Italy, France, and other places for these last sixe moneths past historically reduced to time, place, and action, till the end of the yeare 1636. according to the forraine computation. In which short space you will finde much variety of matter, and no small alteration amongst princes. All faithfully taken out of good originals by an English Mercury.
Diatelesma. Part 1.

The principall passages of Germany, Italy, France, and other places for these last sixe moneths past historically reduced to time, place, and action, till the end of the yeare 1636. according to the forraine computation. In which short space you will finde much variety of matter, and no small alteration amongst princes. All faithfully taken out of good originals by an English Mercury.
Diatelesma. Part 1.
titleStmt.author: N. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by N. Okes, R. Bishop, M. Dawson, and others] for Nath. Butter, and Nicholas Bourne,

notesStmt.note: Part 1 of five news tracts issued from 1636 to 1639, of which the last three are entitled "Diatelesma".
"Okes pr[inted]. quires B-F, L-N; Bishop, O-1st Q; Dawson, 2nd Q-R"--STC.
Variant: "Numb. primo." at head of title. There are also variants in quires B and K.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
